tasks.name: Create Legacy Chat Archive Directory Structure
tasks.description: Create the proper directory structure for archiving legacy chat API files following AutoBot repository cleanliness standards. Establish scripts/archive/legacy-chat-apis/ directory with proper permissions and organization.
tasks.notes: Follow existing scripts/archive/ structure and naming conventions

relatedFiles.description: Existing archive directory structure to follow
New archive directory for legacy chat files

tasks.implementationGuide:
Create directory: scripts/archive/legacy-chat-apis/
Ensure proper permissions and folder structure
Add README.md explaining archive purpose
Verify directory follows AutoBot archive patterns
tasks.verificationCriteria: Directory created successfully with proper permissions, follows existing archive structure, contains initial README.md
tasks.analysisResult: Archive legacy chat API files to clean up AutoBot codebase while preserving active chat_consolidated.py functionality. Critical finding: chat_knowledge.py is NOT legacy but an active dependency. Archive only 4 confirmed legacy files: chat.py, async_chat.py, chat_improved.py, chat_unified.py. Maintain system integrity through proper validation and testing.
tasks.summary: Successfully created legacy chat archive directory structure at scripts/archive/legacy-chat-apis/ with proper permissions (755). Added comprehensive README.md explaining archive purpose, file inventory, restoration process, and validation criteria. Directory follows AutoBot repository cleanliness standards and existing archive patterns. All verification criteria met: directory created, proper permissions set, follows existing structure, contains initial documentation.
